purposeDescriptions.low: forces together multiple fluids to create a strange and unstable heterogenous mixture
purposeDescriptions.high: permenantly and inseparably mixes multiple fluids
purposeDescriptions.invLow: temporarily and poorly separates a fluid mixture
purposeDescriptions.invMid: separates a fluid mixture by weight
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: permanently separates a fluid mixture by a caster defined parameter
